name: RunDLL32 Spawning Explorer
description: Detects RunDLL32.exe spawning explorer.exe as child, which is very uncommon, often observes Gamarue spawning the explorer.exe process in an unusual way
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND process.executable:*\\explorer.exe) AND (NOT (process.parent.command_line:*\\shell32.dll,Control_RunDLL*)))`
